mapper.select: select * from ( select row_number() over(order by product_id) as rownum, p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_weight, p.product_info, p.product_price, p.product_stock, p.product_image, c.category_type, c.category_acidity, c.category_aroma, c.category_body, c.category_sweet from product as p, category as c where p.product_id = c.product_id and c.category_type like #{category_type}) A where rownum <= #{rowCount} and rownum >= #{start}
select count(*) as totalCount from product as p, category as c where p.product_id = c.product_id and c.category_type like #{category_type}
